data.name: Escapers
data.detailed_description:
Team up with your friends or with randoms to escape from variety of different maps, or alone (if you dare).
However your journey is being infiltrated by guards and obstacles, after all you are prisoner on each map.
There is no one way to escape. Possibilities are only limited by your creativity and skill.


Are you the master Escaper?

Find your way to escape and master the maps! Have fun with friends and level up your account. Open rollers to get cosmetical items that you can sell on Steam Marketplace afterwards or equip to pimp up your looks.

- 3 Maps to explore!
- Up to 10 player matches!
- Solo/Speedrunning mode!
- Various ways to escape. Use your imagination!
- Different difficulties!
- Free cosmeticals!

Have fun!

data.short_description: Escapers is co-op, puzzle escaping game. Your only goal is to get away!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-1220PE
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD RX 580 or Nvidia GTX 770
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-1250P
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD RX Vega 8 or Nvidia GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
